itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson sits down with Rant Nation and Dear America host Graham Allen to discuss what it's like to blow up on the internet and not have any money, predictions for the upcoming 2020 Presidential Election, and what it's like to have death threats against you because of your political beliefs.
